name: CP_8_1_Generate__Record_and_Distribute_Patient_Specific_Instructions
title: CP.8.1 Generate, Record and Distribute Patient-Specific Instructions (Function)
description: Generate and record patient-specific instructions related to pre- and post-procedural and post-treatment/discharge requirements.
purpose: When a patient is scheduled for a test, procedure, or discharge, specific instructions about diet, clothing, transportation assistance, convalescence, follow-up with physician, etc., may be generated and recorded, including the timing relative to the scheduled event. In an outpatient scenario, similar instructions for post-diagnosis, and/or post-treatment needs may also be generated and recorded (e.g., exercise instructions for low back pain, wound or burn care).

statement.label: CP.8.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to determine and render standardized instruction sets pertinent to the patient condition, for procedures, or scheduled events.

statement.label: CP.8.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to render instructions pertinent to the patient as selected by the provider.

statement.label: CP.8.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to transmit instruction information in electronic format to be provided to the patient.

statement.label: CP.8.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to render as part of patient instructions details on further care such as follow up, return visits and appropriate timing of further care.

statement.label: CP.8.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to capture an indication that instructions were given to the patient.

statement.label: CP.8.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to capture the actual instructions given to the patient or a reference to the document(s) containing those instructions.

statement.label: CP.8.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to annotate patient-specific instructions.

statement.label: CP.8.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture and maintain, as discrete data, the reason for variation from rule-based clinical messages and patient information.

statement.label: CP.8.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to manage patient instructions in multiple languages.

statement.label: CP.8.1#10
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to manage a list of appropriate patient instructions based on age.

statement.label: CP.8.1#11
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to manage a list of appropriate patient instructions based on gender.

statement.label: CP.8.1#12
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to manage a list of appropriate patient instructions based on diagnosis.

statement.label: CP.8.1#13
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to manage a list of appropriate patient instructions based on reading level.

statement.label: CP.8.1#14
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to render educational materials using alternative modes to accommodate patient sensory capabilities (e.g., vision impairment, hearing impairment).
